website_summaries.verdict: The hydrolyzed collagen may be gentler on your stomach than regular gelatin and will also dissolve in cold liquid without forming a gel.
pros: Zint is highly invested in supporting sustainable farming and humane treatment of livestock
The serving size is a reasonable 1 Tbs., taken twice daily, which is easily added to your food or drink
cons: Some users tell us they dislike the flavor when added to water, but they can easily mask it by adding it to juice, coffee, or smoothie

customer_reviews.title: Best collagen hydrolysate availlable!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite hydrolyzed collagen. I consume 40 grams of collagen protein daily in order to supplement my protein intake and increase amino acid variety. This has zero taste (some are actually really "beefy"...gross), and it has a larger particle size which both reduces mess and improves wetting, making mixing easier. The best part is that, with Subscribe and Save, Zint one of the cheapest sources of collagen protein available. As long as product quality and price stay the same, I will be a loyal customer!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Collagen Supplementation
customer_reviews.text: High quality grass fed collagen. I have been using this Zint brand collagen for quite a few months. It mixes well in water or any other preferred liquid. I am confident that I am getting the collagen that my body needs. As you age your body produces less reason for my supplementation.
customer_reviews.author: Evergreen

customer_reviews.title: this is not true and there is no way I can use the product because it clumps up into pieces and it's honestly the most disgusting thing I've ever tasted
customer_reviews.text: The reviews that I had read before I bought the product praised it as being tasteless and dissolving completely in liquid. It also says this on the bag. Unfortunately, this is not true and there is no way I can use the product because it clumps up into pieces and it's honestly the most disgusting thing I've ever tasted. I've tried to disguise the taste in smoothies, coffee, etc., but it is always overpowering and it makes me gag with every sip. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Woody

customer_reviews.title: great tasteless collagen powder
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping, great tasteless collagen powder. I mix it in everything and bake with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hudson

customer_reviews.title: It isn't "tasteless", but might be bearable...
customer_reviews.text: I just received this in the mail and this is my first time trying collagen peptides, so I can't speak to the health benefits. I have been adding it to blended coffee with coconut oil, grass fed butter, milk, and coconut sugar. It definitely isn't tasteless, but is bearable for now. Not sure if I will adjust to the taste or if it will gross me out more over time. I wanted to point this out because there are so many reviews that claim it has no taste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff. Dissolves quickly
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. Dissolves quickly. No taste (maybe a little taste, but not like other brands. It's more like I can sort of tell it's there....) Seems to be working on my skin and is definitely helping my fingernails. They are much stronger. I don't need to keep them under gel polish to keep them from breaking anymore! I eat a lot of meat and protein in general but my nails were very weak and broke frequently if I let them get the least bit long. They are much better after 6 months of (sometimes sporadic) collagen use.I'm sticking with this stuff and this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Curiosity

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My skin is glowing, hair is growing, nails are stronger, and I'm more alert! Just started my second bag. I love this stuff!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: I purchased the ZINT Collagen Powder and have been very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: After much research, I purchased the ZINT Collagen Powder and have been very happy with the product. Other powdered collagen I previously used created lumps and were difficult to dissolve in room temp liquids. The ZINT collagen dissolved beautifully. No problem. Don't let it sit too long in the liquid without stirring or wisking or shaking if in a bottle. If you immediately move it around and it dissolves well. I also like the fact that the flavor is mild. Other products had such a strong flavor that I discontinues use. The quality was another large factor in my purchase. All around good product.
customer_reviews.author: Maryanne M.

customer_reviews.title: I love my collagen peptides and Zint makes an awesome product ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my collagen peptides and Zint makes an awesome product from grass fed bovine protein. Best feature is that it is in a resealable bag that's not big or bulky in your gym bag or carry-on and T he only thing this product lacks is a scoop. I think it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Trick13

customer_reviews.title: Awful taste
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea if this works or not, because it tastes so awful that I could barely choke it down.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer gold

customer_reviews.title: Sticky clumpy paste
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a few types of collagen and this one has been the worst. Definitely clumps shaking or stiring into liquid. Turns in to a sticky paste. And definitely not tasteless.
customer_reviews.author: lisa hamdalla

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This item caused constipation and Gout. I will not use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Louise Logan

customer_reviews.title: Superior product!
customer_reviews.text: This collagen works well and easily dissolves in cold drinks.I love the protein it gives my body and holds off hunger when I can't eat in a timely fashion.
customer_reviews.author: Houseof10

customer_reviews.title: but I have realized that this stuff is really awesome..
customer_reviews.text: Ok I bought this to help with my healing from a broken leg I am a product junky anna most stuff I purchase I don't see much difference and I never write a review but will read everyone else's and agree or disagree silently...lol....but I have realized that this stuff is really awesome...it mixes well with my coffee with no taste change no clumps or anything like that...what I have noticed that my hair had grown so much and my nails as well (I'm a nail biter so you know what my nails generally look like) I actually have nails that I can polish and they are hard...wow!...I love the product..I hope this helps...
customer_reviews.author: MEdwards

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: this product is not complety non kosher by orthodox certification i made my mistake I'm very upset
customer_reviews.author: David kin

customer_reviews.title: A superior collagen!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this collagen not really knowing what to expect. I've only been using it for about 2 weeks and already noticing differences! One big difference is the bags under my eyes that have been there for 3+ years are starting to go away (and no I'm not getting extra sleep, I have a toddler who still wakes at night) I have already recommended this brand to a few people and will recommend it to anyone asking what brand to get! I will for sure be buying this again when my supply runs out!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t dissolve and weird beef flavor
customer_reviews.text: Gave this a try because of the price, needless to say you get what you pay for. Doesn’t dissolve throughly in my hot tea and gums up. Also had a weird beefy flavor. Pay the extra and go with Sports Research and Vital Proteins.
customer_reviews.author: Glfchic47

customer_reviews.title: Crazy workin' stuff
customer_reviews.text: Stumbled across some reviews for this product and was intrigued by claims that it helps lose weight. After weight gain this past Christmas, I pulled it out and began taking it. ( Love it in warmed up beef or chicken broth). It stirs in just fine and doesn't flavor the drinks at all. Funny thing is, on the days I take it twice a day, the scales show a decrease in weight. On days I forget to use it or do it only once a day, I get nada. How it works I don't know. I just know it does. Try it for yourself and see how it works for you.
customer_reviews.author: westchester

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I don't know about the anti-aging properties of this product, but I do know that it works wonders for joints and muscles. I tore my MCL and meniscus in my knee a couple of years ago. The DR. told me I had arthritis and bone spurs in both knees. This makes it very uncomfortable to walk. I started taking this then. It aided in the healing of both the MCL and the meniscus and it definitely makes it easier to walk by putting more cushion between the joints in the knees.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Glass

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use in my morning coffee
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use in my morning coffee, dissolves nicely and does not add any taste. I was hoping it would help with weight loss and stronger nails. Have not noticed any difference with those desires but suddenly a lot of unwanted facial and leg hair!!! So I guess it works pretty well, just not on what I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: riverhomegal

customer_reviews.title: Collagen that makes a difference.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several types of collagen and I plan to reorder this because it's a company dedicated to their products. It dissolves easily in my coffee and I'm noticing a good change in my nails. The company that makes this only makes a few products and from what I've read they are transparent with what they do. The important thing is the beef are pasture raised so what comes from them will be healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Mae Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: I went about a month ago to do this and the doctor was VERY PLEASED WITH MY X-RAYS In fact the tech who took ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking Zint for about two months now and I take 2 Tbs a day. I also have two hip replacements and had a fractured femur I go d see my orthopaetic doctor every year and he x-rays my hips and femur just to keep an eye on things. I went about a month ago to do this and the doctor was VERY PLEASED WITH MY X-RAYS In fact the tech who took the xrays was looking at them while he took the pictures and he started asking me about my diet My doctor is the best and he is very hard to please.I am very happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Donna J.

customer_reviews.title: Exceeding my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this collagen instead of my previous brand because I like the shrinking package effect of having a bag. It also has upset my digestion less than my previous brand. I expected a scoop, but apparently they had a packaging problem and one wasn't included in a number of units. They owned up to it and are sending me one at no cost. So far, I'm very pleased and will reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Darin L Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: It's just as good as the other collagen in the green can. I bought it for my mother, and she has noticed an improvement in her joints. Her skin has improved, her lines are less prominent, and her hair is thicker. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Threnody

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using it for a couple of weeks; so I can not tell at this point whether it is accomplishing the task for which I bought it. These things take time. But the quality seems to be quite good. It dissolves in cold water the way it should, and it is almost tasteless. There is nothing about this product that has led me to believe it is substandard in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Zeke Sr

customer_reviews.title: After taking this collagen, my nails are stronger than ...
customer_reviews.text: After taking this collagen, my nails are stronger than they have been for years. Unfortunately, I began having severe hot flashes / sweats on waking. I stopped it for a week & the hot flashes stopped, started it again & immediately had unpleasant symptoms. It's documented on Google this collagen can cause hot flashes / sweats. I'm now going to try marine sourced collagen
customer_reviews.author: cheryl noice

customer_reviews.title: I actually see the difference in my skin and joints. I didn't believe anything would really work. but it is.
customer_reviews.text: I use several Z!nt products . I started collagen because I noticed my skin sagging and muscle disappearing. My hands looked dry with thin skin and allot of wrinkles from sun damage and a life of hard farm work. My joints were enlarging. Ive been mixing this collagen into my smoothie for one month and all the above has actually improved! I keep looking at my hands and they look about 5 yrs younger in only a month.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: This is my go to!
customer_reviews.text: I originally got a free small bag of Zint and was very grateful to try. I have not bought any other brand as I have no complaints! This mixes easily in my coffee, and taking a tablespoon twice daily has done wonders for my nails and skin! Zint is what I use!
customer_reviews.author: DJ Sunrise

customer_reviews.title: ... injured my knee and it was not getting any better. I had read about Zint on Facebook
customer_reviews.text: I had injured my knee and it was not getting any better. I had read about Zint on Facebook. I though what have I got to lose? I am on my second bag of Zint and while my knee is not perfect it is much better, plus my hair and nails are growing like crazy. I would give Zint FIVE STARS.
customer_reviews.author: Kay O. Howe

customer_reviews.title: Will Purchase Again
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I put this in my morning cup of java daily. I add it to soups, smoothies, and so forth. I sneak it in many foods so my family will benefit from it too. When adding it to cold drinks I have a mini whisk and I whisk as I pour it in the drink otherwise I end up with a few lumps. Another way to make sure it dissolves (especially in the kids drinks) is to add a little bit of warm tap water (it's just a tiny bit) to dissolve the powder, once dissolved add the cold drink. I love that Zint Collagen comes from pasture raised cows.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Mama

customer_reviews.title: I had back surgery last summer and a friend recommended this product for soft tissue repair
customer_reviews.text: First of all this product has a distinctive flavor that I don't mind. I put it in black coffee in the morning and in hot water with the juice of one lemon and honey in the evening and I barely taste it. I had back surgery last summer and a friend recommended this product for soft tissue repair. I don't think I will know the exact effect on my spinal issues but... my hair is thicker, my nails are smoother, and my skin has turned into head-to-toe spanks! All the wrinkles and crepey skin are disappearing rapidly and I couldn't be happier. I am recommending this to anyone who will listen 😁
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Bryson

customer_reviews.title: A glob of glue........
customer_reviews.text: I have just received my shipment today and was excited to try, everyone on here has said how easy it is to dissolve in any liquid... I tried water, this powder quickly turned into what could be viewed as a lump of glue.... am I doing something wrong.... After several stirs it somewhat dissolved but was left with some glue on the spoon and a thin film stuck around the side of the glass..... I gave up and just drank it... You are correct with the no odor smell and it taste just as water should, with a little greasy feel in the mouth, but it is do able ... how do I get it to dissolve properly?????
customer_reviews.author: Linda Jones

customer_reviews.title: I'm going on my 3rd bag and i love this mixed in my coffee in the morning
customer_reviews.text: I'm going on my 3rd bag and i love this mixed in my coffee in the morning. It doesn't have any flavor to it and mixes in smoothly. i tried the gelatin one recent and it has a odor and clumps up in my coffee. I will stick with this one and use the gelatin for gummies.
customer_reviews.author: Drose

customer_reviews.title: It mixes in to both warm and cold liquids fine, and there is only a slight taste to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking this for about a week so I don't have any feedback as to whether the product is having any improvement on my skin/hair/nails/joints. I'll try to remember to update it after a month with any improvements. It mixes in to both warm and cold liquids fine, and there is only a slight taste to it (I mix it into my morning coffee & in the afternoon into a bottle of water w/ a crystal lite packet in it to mask the taste).
customer_reviews.author: Susan Whittington

customer_reviews.title: Good one!
customer_reviews.text: Great collagen! I've been trying different brands to see the difference between them, specially flavor wise, and this has very little (or nothing, I can say) flavor and smell, and it dissolves good. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Laysa Durski

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Love the packaging, instead of big bulky containers we get a collapsible bag that doesn't take up much space in the wastebasket. This collagen is easy to mix into warm fluids, but a little more difficult in cold. Has very little noticeable flavor when added, more like a silky sensation it gives to whatever you add it to. I have noticed a huge difference in not feeling as hungry when used for supplementation. Also it helps tremendously in healing wounds like tattoos and scars!
customer_reviews.author: April Garcia

customer_reviews.title: There is a scooper! please read.
customer_reviews.text: The first time I ordered this, I got the 10oz bag just to see if I liked the product. I immediately LOVED it. Not clumpy, no taste, dissolved perfectly. However, with the 10oz bag there was no scoop! So instead I just used a measuring spoon (1TBSP) as my scooper... not a big deal. Since I loved the product so much I ended up going up to the 16oz. To my surprise, there was a scooper!!! So maybe the people who made this product, only put scoopers in the bigger bags???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems like good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is my second round of purchasing Zint collagen. I don't have any problem with the taste. Although it isn't entirely flavorless it's so slight that I can hardly tell the difference in my coffee. With that said, I don't have a sensitive pallet; I'm not sure if it would bother someone else. It dissolves instantly with hot liquids. I gave it four stars because I haven't seen any significant results yet for my skin, pain, or stomach issues. I ordered it again because I wanted to see if 60 days would make a difference over the 30. I will update after this second round.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Beware lyzine to arganine ratio for herpes patients
customer_reviews.text: I learned that the amino acids arginine and lyzine are in proportions in this product that are opposite of what they should be. It should be 4:1 ratio lyzine(4):arginine(1). This product is roughly 1:7... terrible for people with herpes of any kind. After only 2 days I was hit with an outbreak that I haven't had at all for decades.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Have only used it about a week for minor to moderate joint stiffness and pain. Missed a day- won't be doing that again! I will take this consistently going forward - really helps. Plus! Hair and nails growing faster. Smells a little funny (like plain gelatin) when mixing. Been mixing with juices - makes them taste a little "thicker" - not in a bad way. Just more substantial. Will also be trying this in smoothies also!
customer_reviews.author: s. davis

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I am an older woman and this product seems to be helping my skin by reducing wrinkles. I usually mix it in with orange juice and don't notice any change to the flavor. I will continue to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to add extra protein to my diet. In the 3 weeks I have been using it I have noticed my nails are growing more quickly. I do sprint intervals weekly and I feel like my joints recover more quickly so that is nice. I don't think I have been using it long enough to see cosmetic wrinkle reduction or anything like that. I didn't purchase the product for that reason anyway. I do however feel less hungry having incorporated more protein into my diet so it has met my expectations and am happy having purchased this supplement. If I remember I will update with my results once I finish the bag.
customer_reviews.author: NLofurno

customer_reviews.title: So much new hair growth!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product really has worked! My skin looks better, less dryness and breakouts (UGH, menopause!) my hair is growing like crazy plus I have tons of new hair from where it had thinned. Its easy to use, I just mix it with my morning shake. I will definitely continue to use this!
customer_reviews.author: Dawnell Wilson

customer_reviews.title: I'm really glad I tried it and I will be ordering again
customer_reviews.text: I usually order another brand from another website. When the other website was having an issue and couldn't send my order right away, I decided to try this one. I'm really glad I tried it and I will be ordering again. It dissolves extremely well, actually impressively well.
customer_reviews.author: AmyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for nail health!
customer_reviews.text: A great collagen product, I add it too coffee or yogurt and it mixes easily with no clumping or flavor. I use it for joint health and can tell it is having an effect because my finger nails are growing strong and they were always fragile and chipping and breaking. So hope that it has as positive effect on my joints as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Good price & product
customer_reviews.text: Great price! I switched from bulletproof to Z!int bc I couldn’t find Bulletproof on Amazon when I needed it. Glad I did! It’s more reasonable than BP and desolves quicker. I use it for the protein with hopes it helps my hair bc of bariatric surgery. Really don’t see much of a difference, my hair did stop falling out but not sure if it’s bc of the collagen or the rapid weight loss which stopped over a year ago. I continue to take this for my skin, joints and hair.
customer_reviews.author: Ree

customer_reviews.title: Not at all yucky
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with this product. It is totally flavorless. I mix it in with my oatmeal & soup & can't even tell a difference in consistency of food or drink. I don't know yet if it actually works as advertised because I haven't been taking it long enough. I was so sure it would be disgusting that I put off actually using it for a couple months after I got it. After I finish the bag I will post again if I see any improvement health-wise in my skin or hair.
customer_reviews.author: P. K. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It mixes better by stirring it into a small amount of hot ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this powder for almost two months, and my nails have gotten harder already! It mixes better by stirring it into a small amount of hot water, and then pouring that into whatever beverage you desire.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Use this daily! Only dislike is it clumps when cold
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Have been using it for gut health and skin health and to add some extra protein to my meals. I add it to smoothies, tea, soups, sauces all kinds of things. It usually dissolves really well, although if I’m making my smoothie with frozen fruit it does tend to clump. I don’t seem to have that problem unless I’m dealing with really cold temps. So I try to mix it into my liquid first before making the smoothie. It’s a staple in my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: After trying different products this one clearly stood out as the best one to me
customer_reviews.text: I have been using your product for quite awhile and make a point to never run out. After trying different products this one clearly stood out as the best one to me. As much as I do love your product & the reason that I didn't give you a 5 star is because the last time I got my order there was a leak somewhere in the packaging and I think that you may want to improve on your seals or at least give them a double look to make sure they are completely sealed. Overall I can't say anything negative about your collagen! <3 Absolutely awesome
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: ... "green can" collagen for about a year with very good results. I ordered the Zint version recently due ...
customer_reviews.text: Have used the "green can" collagen for about a year with very good results. I ordered the Zint version recently due to the slight difference in price and have been disappointed. It does not dissolve well at all in warm liquids but instead gets stuck in gloopy globs in my morning coffee. There is also a kind of malted taste that is almost sour - although I wouldn't describe it as exactly unpleasant, it is noticeable and represents a marked difference from the brand I've been using. Won't reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Baroness Blixen

customer_reviews.title: A quality prduct
customer_reviews.text: This collagen seems fine. Not as quickly dissolved as other brands. But , this is a good product and half the price of some other brands that do dissolve a bit easier. Very happy with the quality and it does take a little bit to dissolve, but worth the wait. No texture or flavor. A very good value. A very good product
customer_reviews.author: J Peeples

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The quality is superb, mixing in cold and hot liquid, comes from alpage raised bovine and is fine with kosher and halal diets. I bought it in the 2lbs bag because if was the best price for the quality but the recent price hike (78%) will prevent me from buying it here since I can get it directly from Zint USA for thirty-eight dollars for a two lbs bag and with free shipping or from Great Lakes which is as great, here at Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: F. Denry

customer_reviews.title: Good product and good price.
customer_reviews.text: Ive researched this collagen and it was in a top 5 recommendation so when I saw it on sale in a lightening deal I jumped on trying it. (It's already a good price). I like it a lot. It works just as well as more expensive brands I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaLynn76

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was flavorless?! Ughhhhhh I can’t stand the taste.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: I am optimistic
customer_reviews.text: I use this daily to put in my coffee. No after taste or flavor. Absolutely love this! I cant comment on health and beauty benefits per se but this has been my 2nd bag ordering this over a period of a couple of years. I don't know if it works but i love the concept of it. I also use a lot of collagen skin care and sheet masks. I'm overall looking Fab!
customer_reviews.author: Love Charmed

customer_reviews.title: This product had great reviews so I decided to purchase it
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try collagen for my various health issues. This product had great reviews so I decided to purchase it. It hasn't caused any issues and blends well with the shake I am mixing it in. I can tell a difference in the strength of my fingernails and my hair. It was shipped and received quickly.
customer_reviews.author: TMichael

customer_reviews.title: I mix this every morning in my coffee and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I mix this every morning in my coffee and I can see a difference in my skin after about a month of regular use. My joints feel cushioned and less achy when running.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Girl

customer_reviews.title: Will continue to purchase this product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of Zint Collagen Hydrolysate Protein and it will continue to be my go-to collagen product. It has no flavor, and with a fine powder consistency, dissolves easily in my coffee every morning. I love it and the price is right, too!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Dissolves quickly A+++
customer_reviews.text: What I like most about Zint Collagen is that it desolves completely and quickly in my coffee. Others I have tried clump up and take a while to dissolve. That's why I always buy Zint.
customer_reviews.author: WLBEKKLJ

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Stirring in 2 tablespoons of this every morning and not sure what I am supposed to be seeing. The powder is tasteless so goes into your coffee. If you stir into something cold it will clump but can be smoothed out with a little heavy stirring. In smoothies there is no problem. I am continuing to take and hope to see some improvement in hair and skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad...
customer_reviews.text: It does have a sort of "beefy" smell to it out of the package. So glad that disappears once it dissolves in my drink! I was pretty nervous at first, thinking it was going to add the same taste. But, it is tasteless, thank goodness. And it does mix well, dissolves pretty quickly with just a few stirs.
customer_reviews.author: Ketokraze :)

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Works great. Finally the pain in my arches are gone! Been taking this morning and night for about 3 weeks daily..great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: shery43

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This is one product I will not go without. I'm an ex college football player with all over body aches especially my lower back, knees and ankles. This collagen product has help ease the pain and stiffness in all my joints. It has become a staple in my supplement stack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is the second time I’ve purchased the collagen and I can see a difference in my skin, hair and nails. Use is twice a day with my 310 nutrition program.
customer_reviews.author: Amaritza

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I took this for a full 30 days expecting amazing results and I honestly don’t see any difference in my skin or hair. I mixed the powder in my coffee every morning. It did make me feel full in the mornings from the protein so I felt satisfied with that.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Love it....feel good taking it!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Zint collagen hydrolysate. I first bought a 2# bag. I believe it was a little cheaper in price...since than I bought another bag. I'm using a couple tablespoons a day for a little extra added protein. I have a little whisk and mix it in my yogurt n it mixes really well and it doesn't change the taste of the yogurt either. I am going to continue taking this and will keep buying this brand. Beauty comes from the inside out....this will slow the aging process....buying creams is a waste of money....
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just mixed 2 tbls into my bullet proof tea. It mixed in very quickly and didn't change the flavor at all!!! Very happy! I'm on a LCHF diet and I needed to up my protein. This made it very easy. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Andi

customer_reviews.title: It mixes very easily into my morning coffee and is virtually taste free ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my first purchase of Zita Collagen Hydrolysate. I did so after being diagnosed with a hyper mobility connective tissue syndrome, and the use of collagen was suggested to help with some of the symptoms. The first thing I noticed was that my nails started to grow again. I am uncertain about the joint improvements yet, but remain hopeful. It mixes very easily into my morning coffee and is virtually taste free which is important to me. I will definitely purchase again...and a bigger bag next time!
customer_reviews.author: kathryn lyerly

customer_reviews.title: Really good product. Experiencing benefits.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I've already ordered my second bag & graduated to the two-pound bag because my husband is going to begin to use it. May also start giving it to my dog. I have noticed many of the improvements mentioned in other reviews & also on their website. I will continue to use Zint's Hydrolysate Protein Powder.
customer_reviews.author: RebaShu

customer_reviews.title: Good Collagen but not enough for joint pain
customer_reviews.text: This was a very good collagen. But these don’t have all the collagen that I needed. I need more joint support. But for skin, hair, and nails this collagen is very good quality. And I can tell the difference in the grass fed collagen. And I did get some joint support. Just not as much as I,II,III,V,&X that I currently take.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Edge

customer_reviews.title: Really like it, no flavor (that's a good thing!)
customer_reviews.text: Like this one a lot better than other ones I've tried. Love that it's from grass fed beef, and love that it doesn't have a gross flavor. I can't even taste it when I add it to my coffees or smoothies.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: No guarantee this product does anything.
customer_reviews.text: This product has no taste and mixes well in hot water. If making a cold smoothie use a blender to get the lumps out. Weather this does what it promotes - the jury is still out. I have been using it consistently and waiting to see more youthful skin.
customer_reviews.author: MGartrell

customer_reviews.title: ... big brands of collagen and this is just as superior as any others
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other big brands of collagen and this is just as superior as any others! No taste and easily mixed in hot or cold liquids.
customer_reviews.author: BooKnerd

customer_reviews.title: Giving it a fair chance
customer_reviews.text: Third time I have bought the product and I feel I am not as stiff when I wake up in the morning than usual. Still hoping to see the difference in my hair and nails, we'll try it a couple more times and then decide.
customer_reviews.author: wkrob

customer_reviews.title: Skin, hair, nails & joint benefits
customer_reviews.text: I love how quickly this dissolved in my morning coffee. It is completely tasteless and odorless. After a few weeks, I noticed my hair and nails were growing much quicker, my skin was incredibly softer, and joint pain reduced. This is definitely a product that is worth its weight.
customer_reviews.author: YUSUF

customer_reviews.title: More Energy on 1st day!
customer_reviews.text: I like it!.. I noticed a difference in 1 day.. hello waiting for the more youthful appearance.. I am on my 2nd bag now.. will switch if I don't see a visual improvement... But on first day I had more energy and clarity.. So that's something!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Best value and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Great value. Collagen can do wonders for the body. I get reminded to order this one when we get low.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: dissolves instantly
customer_reviews.text: i feel like out of all the collagen powders (i've tried 3 others), this one is the best. It dissolves instantly, you see results pretty fast (especially in my nails), and it is not as powdery at the others therefore does not make a poofy mess every time you deal with it. This one is a good one, would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: EsoulTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: 6th time we have reordered. Amazing product having amazing results for two senior citizens. We have more energy than most 50 year old acquaintences and plan to consume for many years in the future
customer_reviews.author: AutoRod

customer_reviews.title: Love It !
customer_reviews.text: Always a good product, I love the hydrolysate collegen protein to stabilize blood sugar and for it's purity, no additives. Soy protein can make me tired, whey is better but usually mixed with fillers and sweetener. I will continue buying from Zint.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easily dissolving, tastes a bit
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for 1,5 months, two scoops per day. Can's exactly say if it worked, cause I did not feel any change. BUT the fact was that I received a plenty of compliments from my friends... I always had acne on my back and some pigment spots on the face, the complexion of my skin became smoother, no vivid spots any more. Only thing is that I usually forgot to add the powder to my smoothie as it changed the taste of the coffee. So next time I'd better order pills.
customer_reviews.author: DianaSeven

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: The best Collagen Powder... dissolves completely and is tasteless. I'm on my 3rd bag of this and it won't be my last. Many benefits for skin, hair nails etc.
customer_reviews.author: maria davida

customer_reviews.title: We like it better than GL
customer_reviews.text: A bit less expensive than Great Lakes. It does not dissolve as easily as GL, but it is collagen and I think the gooey consistency is probably a good indication it is the real deal. It does dissolve with a bit more stirring, but we like it and it is from grass fed beef, unlike GL which should put it on their packages if they do. We like it.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and awesome customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for over 3months and have seen amazing results! Nails are growing, hair is growing, and skin is glowing! I had a small issue with my first order and the company took care of me with no hesitation, great customer service!! I will be a lifetime customer!
customer_reviews.author: Christina F.

customer_reviews.title: Great for nails and hair
customer_reviews.text: My beautician asked what shampoo I was using, and told her the one she recommended and she said your hair looks great! I told her I started using this Collagen and now she is going to order some. ha ha It really helped my nails too so much I have to cut them down! I put in my coffee with cream and hardly notice a taste.
customer_reviews.author: Lola’s mom

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a number of brands of collagen and this is superior to all. Dissolves instantly in hot drinks, no taste, and no after taste. I've not tried it in cold drinks because I use it twice a day, in coffee in the morning & dry bedtime in hot tea.
customer_reviews.author: yss

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It doesn't have any taste so you can mix it with just about any food or drink. I Like to put it in my yogurt. works perfect for me
customer_reviews.author: Jlc

customer_reviews.title: It's worth a try!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bag of the collagen hydrolysate. I feel like it is worth continuing with because I have not experienced soreness in my knees after a long bike ride or walk. I also am hopeful about it helping to improve my skin and hair and decided to finish this second bag to determine if that is happening! It is easy to use and has no flavor.
customer_reviews.author: mishmash

customer_reviews.title: Good product or not.
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure about this product the bag is almost empty but I do not feel any good results happened. I was expecting my brittle and dry fingers to get better.
customer_reviews.author: Vhouc Cho

customer_reviews.title: Best Product EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! After the first week my skin showed noticeable difference. The age spots disappeared from the back of my hands. I have more energy. This is an amazing product!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen A. Durham

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Seems ok. Did not notice the improvement in my skin like I did with my other brand
customer_reviews.author: Frances Cox

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I switched to this product from a different brand because it was a bit less expensive. I’m not impressed. My face broke out within the first week after having clear skin for months (from other brand) I noticed more joint pain after my 12 hour shifts and it doesn’t dissolve very well. Not impressed 😫
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Clark

customer_reviews.title: Healthy addition to savory dishes and soups.
customer_reviews.text: Tried adding it to smoothies but it definitely has a cow like flavor that most people probably wouldn't notice..I just have a sensitive palette. I will be using in it soups and savory dishes to boost my family's collagen intake (which don't get enough of since our diet consists mostly of lean meats and store bought broths).
customer_reviews.author: Cverhoff

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend Zint.
customer_reviews.text: I put a level scoop in my coffee. It dissolves quickly. Occasionally I notice a slight taste difference, but it is not bad. I take it because of bad knees that I used to get shots in every 6 month. Since taking Zint I haven’t had to go back for a shot in over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn B

customer_reviews.title: Love the price
customer_reviews.text: Dissolves as well as other collagen hydrolysate I have tried. The price beats all other brands I have tried. I plan to continuing buying. I can't tell if this works or if any other works but have read how beneficial bone broth is for the body. Much easier to use this powder than making my own.
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA A.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this collagen for almost two months now. It dissolves well in both cold and hot liquids. I mostly use it in my morning coffee, which has been iced coffee until just recently. Some of the reviews complain about the packaging, but I just pour it into a large jar for storage anyway, so this packing actually made that easier to do than pouring from a canister. Overall, a really great product! I just wish it would be added to Amazon's Subscribe & Save program to make my restocking easier.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne in PDX

customer_reviews.title: Love it and hope to never be without it
customer_reviews.text: Have re-ordered this item many times, helps my joints, skin, hair and nails. Love it and hope to never be without it!
customer_reviews.author: greeneyes

customer_reviews.title: Unusual Smell for Last Order
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered and enjoyed Zint collagen many times but the last order's powder had an extremely potent smell of feet. I tried to contact the seller to request money back and didn't hear back.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Roesing

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was the one who gave me information about collagen. I have been taking it since December 2018. Has improved my skin but the best is that it has made my grey hair much darker. Not sure about the over all joint benefits but I am sure that it has helped my knees. Great product..will continue to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Post

product_meta.title: Zint Collagen Peptides Powder (16 oz): Paleo-Friendly, Keto-Certified, Grass-Fed Hydrolyzed Collagen Protein Supplement - Unflavored, Non GMO
feature_bullets: REPLENISH YOUR BODY’S COLLAGEN: Zint Collagen Peptides Powder replenishes your body’s declining collagen supply, rejuvenating your skin, hair, nails and joints for natural beauty and youthfulness.*

EXCEPTIONAL DISSOLVABILITY & TASTE: Our premium collagen powder is neutral in flavor and dissolves easily in any liquid, making it perfect for smoothies or your morning coffee to get your daily anti-aging collagen boost!*
PREMIUM COLLAGEN SUPPLEMENT: Zint offers a pure, premium, unflavored collagen powder, sourced from non-GMO, grass fed, pasture raised cattle: no preservatives, Paleo friendly, kosher certified.

ZINT BEAUTY ELEMENTS: With collagen types I & III, Zint’s collagen hydrolysate restores your body’s most basic building block for skin moisture and smoothness, reducing wrinkles and sagging for a naturally glowy complexion.*
SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: We’re confident that you’ll love Zint. If you’re not satisfied for any reason, we’ll give you a full refund with 90 days of purchase.
